price: Àwọn aburú ohun tí wọ́n ṣe níṣẹ́ sì hàn sí wọn. Àti pé ohun tí wọ́n ń fi ṣe yẹ̀yẹ́ sì dìyà tó yí wọn po.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā ʿamilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
